item.title: Magic Firewall functions
item.description: Magic Firewall Functions bit_slice(String, Number, Number) Number Select a slice of contiguous bits from a string field. This is primarily intended for use with ip and tcp. The slice can be no longer than 31 bits, but multiple calls can be joined together via a logical expression. Use of structure fields is preferred over this mechanism.
